alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead and Western Madison below 6000ft; Gates of the Mountains; Madison River Valley; Missouri Headwaters; Northwest Beaverhead County; Ruby Mountains and Southern Beaverhead Mountains; Southern High Plains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued April 12 at 3:54AM MDT until April 14 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO MIDNIGHT MDT THURSDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 4 and 8 inches at lower elevations, with 8 to 12 inches over mountain passes, with higher amounts above pass level. * WHERE...Portions of central, north central, and southwest Montana. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to Midnight MDT Thursday Night. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely become slick and hazardous. Travel could be difficult and visibility at times could be below one half mile. Isolated power outages possible due to the heavy wet snow.
info.instruction: To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock please visit our webpage and select Local Programs then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock.
